xr.title: XR PLACE
xr.description: Convenient tools for object presentations: create virtual tours taking into account time and resource costs

philosophy.label: Our Philosophy
philosophy.text1: We offer a unique widget for creating virtual tours that allow your clients to explore properties in an interactive format.

widget.label: Widget
widget.description: Our widget creates immersive and realistic representations of real estate objects. This helps clients make informed decisions. We offer easy-to-use solutions that integrate seamlessly into your business processes.

featureDescriptions.panoramic: Customers will see a complete copy of the property, even if it's still under construction or located in another country
featureDescriptions.layout: Thanks to the widget, customers can study the layout and interior design. This helps them visualize their apartment more realistically
featureDescriptions.movement: The widget allows users to easily move between different rooms of the apartments, making it easier to choose suitable housing
featureDescriptions.accuracy: The 3D widget allows you to see the exact layout, including room dimensions, window and door locations, and the view from the window
featureDescriptions.interactivity: Users interact with real estate objects like in a computer game. This makes the housing selection process more exciting and interesting. As a result, customers stay on the site longer and return to use the widget again
featureDescriptions.crossplatform: You can use our widget on desktop, phone, tablet, and even VR glasses in the company office to show users maximum immersion

cooperation.label: Cooperation
cooperation.description: Our clients are part of our team. You can always count on our support and expertise — we strive to make our partnership meaningful.
